languages.text: "Зато я не забуду". {n}Джай мрачно улыбается фактотуму.{/n} "Не будем играть в игры, {name}. Ты все слышал{mf||а}, ты все знаешь".
"But I won't forget." {n}Jae smiles grimly at the Factotum.{/n} "Let's not play games, {name}. You heard everything. You know everything."
languages.original_text: "Зато я не забуду". {n}Джай мрачно улыбается фактотуму.{/n} "Не будем играть в игры, {name}. Ты все слышал{mf||а}, ты все знаешь".

traits.locale_text: "But I won't forget." {n}Jae smiles grimly at the Factotum.{/n} "Let's not play games, {name}. You heard everything. You know everything."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But I won't forget." {n}Jae smiles grimly at the Factotum.{/n} "Let's not play games, {name}. You heard everything. You know everything."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But I won't forget." {n}Jae smiles grimly at the Factotum.{/n} "Let's not play games, {name}. You heard everything. You know everything."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But I won't forget." {n}Jae smiles grimly at the Factotum.{/n} "Let's not play games, {name}. You heard everything. You know everything."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “但我是不会忘掉的。”{n}婕伊对高阶顾问露出了严酷的笑容。{/n}“咱们别再玩游戏了，{name}。你全都听到了，也全都知道了。”
languages.original_text: "But I won't forget." {n}Jae smiles grimly at the Factotum.{/n} "Let's not play games, {name}. You heard everything. You know everything."

traits.locale_text: “但我是不会忘掉的。”{n}婕伊对高阶顾问露出了严酷的笑容。{/n}“咱们别再玩游戏了，{name}。你全都听到了，也全都知道了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「でも、あたしは忘れない」{n}ジェイはファクトタムに向かって笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「遊びはやめましょう、{name}様。あんたはすべてを聞いた。あんたはすべてを知ってる」
languages.original_text: "But I won't forget." {n}Jae smiles grimly at the Factotum.{/n} "Let's not play games, {name}. You heard everything. You know everything."

traits.locale_text: 「でも、あたしは忘れない」{n}ジェイはファクトタムに向かって笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「遊びはやめましょう、{name}様。あんたはすべてを聞いた。あんたはすべてを知ってる」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Pero yo no lo olvidaré». {n}Jae sonríe sombría al factótum.{/n} «No vamos a jugar, {name}. Lo ha oído todo. Lo sabe todo».
languages.original_text: "But I won't forget." {n}Jae smiles grimly at the Factotum.{/n} "Let's not play games, {name}. You heard everything. You know everything."

traits.locale_text: «Pero yo no lo olvidaré». {n}Jae sonríe sombría al factótum.{/n} «No vamos a jugar, {name}. Lo ha oído todo. Lo sabe todo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Mais moi, je n'oublierai rien, {n}dit Jae en adressant un sourire sombre au factotum.{/n} Assez joué, {name}. Vous avez tout entendu. Vous savez tout. »
languages.original_text: "But I won't forget." {n}Jae smiles grimly at the Factotum.{/n} "Let's not play games, {name}. You heard everything. You know everything."

traits.locale_text: « Mais moi, je n'oublierai rien, {n}dit Jae en adressant un sourire sombre au factotum.{/n} Assez joué, {name}. Vous avez tout entendu. Vous savez tout. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Aber ich werde es nicht vergessen." {n}Jae lächelt das Faktotum grimmig an.{/n} "Lasst uns keine Spiele spielen, {name}. Ihr habt alles gehört. Ihr wisst alles."
languages.original_text: "But I won't forget." {n}Jae smiles grimly at the Factotum.{/n} "Let's not play games, {name}. You heard everything. You know everything."

traits.locale_text: "Aber ich werde es nicht vergessen." {n}Jae lächelt das Faktotum grimmig an.{/n} "Lasst uns keine Spiele spielen, {name}. Ihr habt alles gehört. Ihr wisst alles."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Fakat ben unutamam." {n}Jae, Kâhya'ya kötü kötü gülümsüyor.{/n} "Oyun oynamayı bırakalım {name}. Her şeyi duydun. Her şeyi biliyorsun."
languages.original_text: "But I won't forget." {n}Jae smiles grimly at the Factotum.{/n} "Let's not play games, {name}. You heard everything. You know everything."

traits.locale_text: "Ama ben unutamam." {n}Jae, Kâhya'ya kötü kötü gülümsüyor.{/n} "Oyun oynamayı bırakalım {name}. Her şeyi duydun. Her şeyi biliyorsun."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
